## Exercises {-}

1. Use SoPlex to obtain the exact optimal value of 
\[\begin{array}{rrcrcrcl}
\min & 3 x & + & 2 y & + & 9 z \\
\text{s.t.} & 53 x & + & 20 y & + & 96 z & \geq & 2 \\
 & 13 x & - & 7 y & + & 6 z & \geq & \frac{3}{17} \\
 & -x & + & 71 y & - & 3 z & \geq & \frac{7}{3} \\
 & x &, & y &,  &z  &\geq & 0.
\end{array}\]
